pullrequest.title: Added multicamera sensor to support synchronized stereo cameras

content.raw:
Hi Nate, that looks like a lot of work. Clearly a newbie like me would have fudged it up. Thanks for your efforts! 

I'm happy to test it if you can tell me when (and which revision is appropriate). I see the Carnegie sensor head is to be added shortly:
http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Roadmap
So presumably thats a good time to test before.

FYI: placing the two cameras at the 7cm seperation specified in the Carnegie spec seems to result in the model's SDF being sensed by each camera.

maurice

I'm happy to test it if you can tell me when (and which revision is appropriate). I see the Carnegie sensor head is to be added shortly: http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Roadmap So presumably thats a good time to test before.
